transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaste sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji, sirjit Maurya baat kar rahe hain aap, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, sir ji bas thoda sa samay chahiye aap se baat karne ke liye. Maine kal bhi do din mein try kiya tha aap se baat ho jaye. Mera naam Prashant hai, main IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hu, senior manager. Sir, aapka discussion hua tha Srishti. Ji, aapka discussion hua tha Srishti se jo aapki IndiaMART relationship manager hai. Aur unke discussion ke baad aapne feedback share kiya tha ki aap satisfied nahi hai discussion se, right?
Customer: To, ek unhi, usi pe discussion karna tha mujhe. Ki aapko IndiaMART ki services se problem hai ya account manager se koi problem ho rahi hai?
Customer: Sir, mujhe usme jo buyleads hai woh nahi aa rahi hai, main usse confirm hu. Aur aap baar baar ispe manager change ho ja rahe hain, woh bhi sahi karke jankari nahi dete hain.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jo bhi aata hai keh deta hai ki hum aapke account manager bol rahe hain. Koi jankari sahi se deta nahi. Isse pehle koi bhi ladies manager bhi, woh bhi unhone bhi sahi jankari nahi di.
Executive: Main, ek minute suniye sir, aisa nahi hota. Phone pe baat kar liye, haan manager bol rahe hain. Are sir, manager ki tarah ek gyan bhi to dena chahiye. Aage tabhi to manager banenge.
Customer: Bilkul gyan dena chahiye sir. Agar zimmedari nahi utha sakte to kisi baat ki koi manager nahi hai.
Executive: Haan. Ab phone pe to sir, phone pe sir har koi baat kar leta hai. Ki mujhe aap waha se koi bologe haan aapka account manager bol raha hu. Main bhi keh dunga haan sir, theek hai, manager bol rahe hain. Abhi to main koi pehchan thodi na hai. Na hum aapko pehchan rahe hain, na mujhe. To uske hisab se jankari bhi dijiye.
Executive: Aapko bilkul jankari deni chahiye aur aap services mein bhi haan kahan pe problem ho rahi hai, kahan pe issues aa rahe hain. In sabhi cheezon ke regarding discussion karna chahiye, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To, main dekh pa raha hu pichle teen chaar mahino mein ye hua hai aapke saath, chaar account, teen account manager change ho chuke hain pichle teen mahino mein.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Ji. To alag alag logo ne pehle matlab koi Govind karke tha, fir Anjal naam se, abhi Srishti dekh rahi hai aapki services.
Customer: Ji, ji, haan.
Executive: So, I will make sure, main ye make sure karunga ki actually ye teeno hi meri team mein the. But teen cheezon ki wajah se ye change karna pada hai. Ab zyada changes nahi honge, sabse pehle to aapko jo matlab ye confirmation hai ye main khud de raha hu. Iske baad, iske baad jo hai, main aapko assure kar raha hu ki services mein koi issues nahi aane denge lekin thoda sa use karna padega. Product wagera se related leads hain aapki lekin pichle kaafi time se matlab open bhi nahi karte aap IndiaMART application.
Customer: Sir, main daily open kar raha hu. Maine Srishti ji se baat hui thi, maine kaha aapko main jo hai screenshot bhi bhej dunga. Ab ye hai ki buyleads consume tabhi to karenge jo kal jo humare matlab ka aayega.
Executive: Ye baat to sahi keh rahe hain aap.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Bina agar aapke product ki buyleads nahi aayegi to aap kyun consume karenge? Sabse pehla question to yahi hota hai.
Customer: To main yahi jaanna chahta hu ki sir product ke related buyleads agar jo mujhe dikh rahi hain, theek hai, usme kya dikkat hai? Kya aap kuch apne location kuch seemit kar rakha hai aapne?
Customer: Sir main abhi office se nikal jaunga, office mein jaake sir aapko call karunga.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir, wait karunga sir. Main, main, main aapke call ka jo hai woh wait karunga, theek hai. Bas ek do cheeze hain sir, hello, jo aap se puchni thi, jo confirmation lena tha. IndiaMART pe jo profile chal raha hai, uski services aap hi dekhte hain aapke yahan se ya fir kisi aur ko de rakha hai aapne?
Customer: Ji, ji, main dekhta hu usko, main dekhta hu.
Executive: Aap khud hi cater karte hain, right? Kisi aur ko nahi de rakha hai. Dusra mujhe ye jaanna tha ki IndiaMART ki jo services aap use kar rahe hain, woh mobile application se use karte hain ya fir aap laptop desktop se use kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, laptop aur mobile dono hain.
Executive: Laptop aur mobile dono hain jisse aap services apni use kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Achha, achha, achha, achha, achha. To main kewal ye reason jaanna chahta tha, theek hai. Main office ek pahuchenge to main usse ek baar detail mein baat kar lunga aap se. Services use karte hue aapko jo samay hua hai IndiaMART pe total, woh abhi lagbhag chhe saat, chhe mahine ke aas paas to complete ho chuka hai, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, ji. Haan, paanch se chhe mahine complete ho chuka hai. To kya is dauran aapko ek bhi direct inquiry ya lead ya call, kuch bhi aisa sampark mein nahi aaya jiske saath aapka fruitful baat hua ho ya fir kuch positive ki taraf aage badhe ho aap log?
Customer: Call aayi hui hai sir. Call aayi bhi hain, magar usme koi bhi labh nahi hua hai baat karne se, na party ne dobara call kari hai.
Executive: Main wahi keh raha hu, buyleads ke zariye, inquiry ke zariye ya call ke zariye, in teeno madhyamo se kya koi ek bhi deal aapki kuch progress mein hai?
Customer: Koi aisi deal nahi hui hai sir.
Executive: Koi bhi deal nahi hui hai. Theek hai sir, main aapka wait kar raha hu, aapka call back kar lenge.
Customer: Sir, kisi time mein pahuchunga office jaake tabhi main aapko call back kar lunga sir.
Executive: Haan, theek hai, main wait kar raha hu sir. Second half mein 2:00 baje tak kar lenge ya fir 3:00 baje tak?
Customer: Sir, 2:00 baje ke baad bhi ho sakta hai, pehle bhi ho sakta hai, main clean nahi kar sakta kyunki abhi main office se 10 minute hue nikloge.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Frequent account manager changes.

- Lack of proper information from account managers.



Resolution:

- Executive assured no further manager changes.

- Executive assured to resolve service issues.

- Will discuss in detail after customer reaches office.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after reaching office.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, services, profile
